note.p: Education: Westminster School; Christchurch College, Oxford. MA
Career: Vicar of Sully, Glamorganshire; Curate of Banbury; Dean of Llandaff (1844-1857); carried out geological researches; was the first to describe the Ichythyosaurus; died of apoplexy
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1857-1859 vol 9 pp 50-52
References: J M Edmonds and J A Douglas, 'William Buckland, FRS (1784-1856) and an Oxford Geological Lecture, 1823' in NR 1975-6 vol 30 pp 141-167
